alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:04PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, north central Carbon, southern Musselshell, Yellowstone and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 304 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of Roundup to 7 miles west of Laurel. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Areas of blowing dust could reduce visibility. Lightning is possible. Locations impacted include... Billings, Columbus, Laurel, Joliet, Fromberg, Lockwood, Worden, Huntley, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Ballantine, Pryor, Broadview, Lavina, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Pompeys Pillar, Edgar, Silesia and Cooney Reservoir State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
